verses.t: How amiable{H3039} are thy tabernacles{H4908}, LordO {H3068} of hosts{H6635}!for the sons: or, of the sons
My soul{H5315} longeth{H3700}, yea, even fainteth{H3615} for the courts{H2691} Lordof the {H3068}: my heart{H3820} and my flesh{H1320} crieth out{H7442} for the living{H2416} God{H410}.

Yea, the sparrow{H6833} hath found{H4672} an house{H1004}, and the swallow{H1866} a nest{H7064} for herself, where she may lay{H7896} her young{H667}, even thine altars{H4196}, LordO {H3068} of hosts{H6635}, my King{H4428}, and my God{H430}.
Blessed{H835} are they that dwell{H3427} in thy house{H1004}: they will be still praising{H1984} thee. Selah{H5542}.
Blessed{H835} is the man{H120} whose strength{H5797} is in thee; in whose heart{H3824} are the ways{H4546} of them.

Who passing{H5674} through the valley{H6010} of Baca{H1057} make{H7896} it a well{H4599}; the rain{H4175} also filleth{H5844} the pools{H1293}.Baca…: or, mulberry trees make him a well, etcfilleth: Heb. covereth
They go{H3212} from strength{H2428} to strength{H2428}, every one of them in Zion{H6726} appeareth{H7200} before God{H430}.strength to…: or, company to company
LordO {H3068} God{H430} of hosts{H6635}, hear{H8085} my prayer{H8605}: give ear{H238}, O God{H430} of Jacob{H3290}. Selah{H5542}.
Behold{H7200}, O God{H430} our shield{H4043}, and look{H5027} upon the face{H6440} of thine anointed{H4899}.

For a day{H3117} in thy courts{H2691} is better{H2896} than a thousand{H505}. I had rather{H977} be a doorkeeper{H5605} in the house{H1004} of my God{H430}, than to dwell{H1752} in the tents{H168} of wickedness{H7562}.I had…: Heb. I would choose rather to sit at the threshold

LordFor the {H3068} God{H430} is a sun{H8121} and shield{H4043}: Lordthe {H3068} will give{H5414} grace{H2580} and glory{H3519}: no good{H2896} thing will he withhold{H4513} from them that walk{H1980} uprightly{H8549}.
LordO {H3068} of hosts{H6635}, blessed{H835} is the man{H120} that trusteth{H982} in thee.
